title: Now Foods: 2 in 1 Correcting Eye Cream, 1 oz
description: Tighten  Brighten Paraben FreeGluten FreeMature Skin Condition: Tired eyes, dark circles, fine linesSolution: Vitamin K and Mulberry Extract aid in reducing dark circles while Seplift DPHP at 1% has been proven to naturally tone and smooth fine lines. Helps correct tired eyes by tightening and brightening skin around the eyes.

title: Nature's Gate Organics C for Yourself, (1.7 fl oz) (50 ml)
description: Advanced Skin Care. Our Vitamin C Serum is potent, yet gentle. This active phyto-complex will help to dramatically refine skin tone and texture, while helping to amplify your skin's natural collagen matrix. This oh-so-smooth formulation visibly reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and even softens the appearance of age spots. Plus, it diminishes the appearance of large pores. Use it daily to treat your skin to the many benefits of cell-protecting Vitamin E and nourishing Vitamin A. The result is skin that feels baby smooth and has a radiant glow. And yes, seeing is believing. Bitter Orange (Citrus Aurantium): The blossoms from the Bitter Orange yield precious Neroli Oil used in perfumes and aromatherapy; its leaves and young shoots also provide Petitgrain Oil. These two oils have a long history of use in traditional medicine to calm anxiety and elevate one's mood. In Asia, Bitter Orange Seed Oil has also been used to help reduce cholesterol. Our formulation relies on the Bitter Orange's high levels of active phyto-nutrients to help refine skin texture. Refines skin texture. Increases rehydration. Diminishes appearance of large pores. Amplifies skin's natural collagen matrix. Paraben free. 70% Certified Organic. Cruelty free. Made with certified organic botanicals. Made in USA.
